autistic_child_alert_description: This alert monitors an autistic child who may be at risk of injury. The output describes the risk level and the child's situation.
making_mess_alert_description: This alert monitors an animal causing a mess. The output is a textual description of the mess.
elder_fall_alert_description: This alert monitors an elderly person getting up from bed at risk of falling. The output describes the elderly person's situation. A webhook is also called sending the output. You can monitor this at https://ailert-viewer.criaty.com.
happy_person_alert_description: This alert monitors people who are happy. The output describes the happiness level. A webhook is also called sending the output. You can monitor this at https://ailert-viewer.criaty.com.
